ai-tha-ap341:1.4_0: so many people will set up.
ai-tha-ap341:2.4_0: I went to the mango grove,
ai-tha-ap341:3.3_0: Like one in a rocky mountain,
ai-tha-ap341:4.3_0: Having thrown up the two arrows,
ai-tha-ap341:4.4_0: so I went to the mango grove
ai-tha-ap341:5.3_0: Well then, I’ve searched for me.
ai-tha-ap341:5.4_0: but I would get what I didn’t.
ai-tha-ap341:6.1_0: I am uncultivated by the terminator.
ai-tha-ap341:7.3_0: and staying at the end of life for life.
ai-tha-ap341:7.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap341:8.1_0: When you’ve reached the final stage of life,
ai-tha-ap341:8.4_0: I went to the company of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap341:9.2_0: which delights in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap341:9.3_0: the perception of the dimension of infinite consciousness and the perception of peace.
ai-tha-ap341:9.4_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap341:11.1_0: after sitting down in the house,
ai-tha-ap341:11.2_0: were fully developed, said in the sāl tree grove.
ai-tha-ap341:13.2_0: the nature of arising and dissolution,
ai-tha-ap341:15.4_0: the measureless virtues of good qualities,
ai-tha-ap341:16.1_0: I’m a boy, and I’ll be his boy.
ai-tha-ap341:16.4_0: in the teaching of the Sakyans.
ai-tha-ap341:17.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap341:17.4_0: like the fruit in the woods.
ai-tha-ap341:19.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable hearing the teaching.
